{{WiFiCert|WFA16598|10/29/2012}}
*[http://www.sleekfox.com/uploads/1/4/7/2/14723824/it_sample.pdf ''Yamaha'' News Release on the AP] :Default settings are per ''Yamaha'''s manual :The device is presumed to use a 00:A0:DE OUI :The sample SSID is specified as ''Yamaha''
*[https://www.amazon.co.jp/-/en/Yamaha-WLX302-Wireless-Access-Point/dp/B00BM4ZC10/ ''Yamaha WLX302'' on '''Amazon.co.jp'''] :ASIN: B00BM4ZC10 (2013-02-27)
===Models=== *[[Yamaha WLX202]] • 802.11ac 2T2R ([https://network.yamaha.com/products/wireless_lan/wlx202/spec#tab Spec.]) • [https://www.amazon.co.jp/-/en/Yamaha-ds-2141646-Wireless-Access-WLX202/dp/B01D2QBF02/ B01D2QBF02] :CPU: [[QCA]] MIPS @720MHz, 256MB/128MB (2016/4) • WFA62578 (2016-05-25) *[[Yamaha WLX302]] • 802.11abgn 2T2R ([https://network.yamaha.com/products/wireless_lan/wlx302/spec#tab Spec.]) • [https://www.amazon.co.jp/-/en/Yamaha-WLX302-Wireless-Access-Point/dp/B00BM4ZC10/ B00BM4ZC10] :CPU: ARM @1200MHz, 256MB/256MB (2013/3) • WFA16598 (2012-10-29) *[[Yamaha WLX402]] • 802.11ac 4T4R ([https://network.yamaha.com/products/wireless_lan/wlx402/spec#tab Spec.]) • [https://www.amazon.co.jp/-/en/WLX402ds-1890611/dp/B01NBM7KD2/ B01NBM7KD2] :CPU: ARM 2× @1400MHz, 32MB+512MB/512MB (2016/11)
*[[Yamaha WLX212]] • [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 • WFA94800 (2020-02-24) :CPU: ARM 4× @717MHz, 8MB+256MB/256MB (2020/7) *[[Yamaha WLX313]] • [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 • WFA77485 (2018-09-05) :CPU: ARM 4× @717MHz, 8MB+256MB/256MB (2018/5)
